name: Watcheldock
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
salt-preserved cuisine, emphasis on dried fish
ritual offerings to tide-spirits before voyages
constraints: ritual magic requires scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or mind-control magics
navigation auguries assist but don't replace charts
notes: tide-dependent access; low tide exposes mudflats
warehouses double as informal market halls
